name: Happy Lock - Get Phone From Kids Without a Fight
description: Does your toddler refuse to give the phone back? Do they start crying, ask for more time, throw a tantrum, and its literally a battle to get the phone back every time? Do you have to get angry to get the phone back? Then Happy Lock is here to help save the day!   Happy Lock smartly and discreetly shows fake low battery messages, phone calls, angry momma bear messages, police sirens and more to help the toddler give the phone back with a fight, tantrum, or without you having to get angry. Imagine the possibility - What if your kids gave you the phone back at the set time you specified? Could you really get the phone back without a fight? Yes, and Yes! Win-win for both parents and kids.   Whats-more, Happy Lock even smartly restricts all apps on the device when activated. When you activate Happy Lock for Kids, all you have to do is select the apps you want to allow for your kid, and the rest of the apps will automatically be blocked. You no longer have to worry if your child will accidentally open another app while using your phone or tablet.  Happy Lock is intended for kids between the age of 2 and 7 and aims to help parents to get the device back without a fight. Download Happy Lock today and help keep your childs relationship with technology safe, healthy, and wholesome.   Happy Lock is created by parents, for parents. We promise youll never have to get angry to get the phone, but we hope to save you from a few by using Happy Lock. :-)
